name: ninicobox
description: A home cloud providing file explorer with permissions and access control lists to share files with friends, and acting as a proxy for other services with content rewriting. Based on NodeJS, Express, JWT, Angular 5, Material Design, with TypeScript for both client and server.
author: Nicolas PERNOUD

scripts.setup: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.debug: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Server,Client" -c "cyan.bold,green.bold" "cd server && npm run watch-debug" "cd client && ng serve"
scripts.build: concurrently -p "[{name}]" -n "Server,Client" -c "cyan.bold,green.bold" "cd server && npm run build" "cd client && npm run build"
scripts.build-translate: npm run build && npm run translate && cd client && npm run ngsw-config
